general.gigTitle: be your full stack web developer in django and react

sellerCard.description: I am a full-stack web developer with 3 years of experience. I am proficient in Python, Django, DRF, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, TypeScript, Next.js, React, HTML, and CSS. I can build a fast, secure, and reliable backend alongside with modern, responsive, and engaging frontend. I can precisely create a website from design, follow instructions, and provide frequent updates on the website's progress. I am fluent in English and available to answer any questions you may have. Contact me now and let's work together!

description.content:
Are you looking to elevate your online presence with a high-quality, engaging, and fast website? Look no further!


As a full-stack web developer, I have designed and developed dozens of top-tier websites that have helped my clients scale their online businesses and improve user experiences.


This GIG OFFERS:

  • Fast, Dynamic, and Responsive Frontend Development, ensuring a smooth user experience with no long loading screens or bugs
  • Complex and Secure Authentication Systems protect your users and data
  • API Integrations implementing 3rd party APIs including Google Maps, ChatGPT, data APIs, and more
  • Fast and Secure Backend Development with Django and PostgreSQL for reliable and efficient backend
  • Custom Web Applications with Admin Panel
  • Payment Gateway Integration
  • API Development with Django Rest Framework
  • Website speed optimization
  • Complex features like Live Chat, Custom Charts, etc.
  • Free Website Hosting Setup


The feature you need is not on the list? Contact me and let me create it!


Why Choose Me?

  • Fluent in English
  • Quality Work
  • Timely Delivery
  • Daily Updates
  • Post-Delivery Support 30+ days of free support


Ready to transform your vision into reality?

Contact me before placing an order!

questionsAndAnswers.question: 1. Will I get source files?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, with every package you will receive source files.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 2. What is meant by "free post delivery support"?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: My basic free support lasts 2 weeks after I deliver the finished website, in that period all bugs that you encounter that are caused by my code will be fixed without any additional charges. By offering free support I ensure you receive what you paid for. For bigger projects support will last longer.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 3. I don't have Figma design, can you develop a website for me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can develop an entire website without design files. Also if you request I can create a design for you in Figma and based on that develop the website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 4. Do you offer website design services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do! A colleague of mine makes amazing designs which I use to develop functional web applications and websites. Me and my friend have a successful history of collaboration on projects for many Fiverr and local clients. If you need website design services, feel free to contact me.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 5. Are you willing to sign NDA?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I am willing to sign NDA.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 6. What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A description of your business model and a list of website features will be enough. If the idea is complex it is preferred to have a call before starting an order. Figma/PSD designs are also very helpful so if you have them you should share them.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 7. Are you available for long-term work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I would love to work with you long-term and help you succeed to the best of my ability.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 8. What technologies do you use to develop websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Depending on the scope of work I can use the following technologies:
HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, JQuery, React, Python, Django, Django Rest Framework and PostgreSQL.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 9. Can you provide some examples of websites you have developed in the past?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, some of the websites I worked on are in my Fiverr portfolio you can check them whenever you like. However, it's important to mention that these are not the ONLY websites I worked on. If you need more details about my previous work please contact me and I will provide all the necessary details.

reviews.comment: This is my first time working with Stefan, and it went very well.  He is professional, flexible, and he can also help you articulate what you need.  I found his pricing to be very fair.  I'm going to continue to use him for development of my app.

It was a pleasure working with Stefan. He kept great communication about the progress of the project and went above and beyond on the design. The delivery of the design was before the deadline and it exceeded expectations. I look forward to further work on the application with Stefan.

Stefan demonstrated exceptional professionalism and code expertise in his work. His quick responsiveness, language fluency, and deep understanding made working with him a seamless experience. Highly recommended for any software development project.

Stefan truly shines in software development! His meticulous attention to DETAIL and professionalism exceeded expectations, delivering top-notch work. Plus, his promptness, cooperation, and politeness made collaborating a breeze.
Great work, super fast and reliable. Sticks to the deadline. 10/10

reviews_snippet.comment: I am extremely satisfied with Stefan's work as a Full Stack Developer. His expertise in both front-end and back-end development has greatly contributed to the success of our projects. Stefan consistently delivers high-quality code, demonstrates excellent problem-solving skills, and maintains effective communication throughout the development process.
Very proactive and friendly communication. Delivers as promised in a very good quality and timely manner. Would always work with Stephan again and are already planning my next assignment for him!

Working with this Seller has been an exceptional experience. Their proficiency in developing Django applications is truly impressive. From the outset, they displayed a deep understanding of my project requirements, translating them into a highly functional and visually appealing application. Communication was seamless throughout the process, with prompt updates and a willingness to address any concerns. Their technical expertise, professionalism, and commitment to delivering a top-notch Django application have made this collaboration incredibly satisfying.

Very competent programmer, looks for customer needs and delivers good work. The communication was very good in chat, for more complicated problems he directly switched for fast and easy zoom meetings. Would recommend for web application services with django for sure.

Stefan is one of those developers that realizes his talents on-the-job.

He can create, which is more than just being a full stack guy. if you are looking for a smart, creative, honest developer that can get the work done he is your guy. I'd hire him soon before you cant afford him.

Thanks Stefan ;)
